item.title: Form problem
item.dc:creator: @Infintry001 Infintry001
item.description:
@Infintry001 wrote:

This is my closeform procedure:

[scar]procedure CloseForm(sender: TObject);
begin
frmDesign.Caption:= frmDesign.Caption + ‘.’;
frmDesign.ModalResult:= mrOk;
end;[/scar]

But after i click the button, the script ends, and my other procedure doesnt run. can anyone help me with this?
